• Swimming lessons are offered seasonally (Summer and Fall) at Old River Park Pool, and Great River Aquatics, and New Bend Aquatics Center
  • How to Register
    • Online Meridian Aquatics Portal
    • Over the Phone
    • In person at City Hall Recreation Department

 

Next Open Swimming Lesson Registration

Fall swimming lessons take place at Great River Aquatics. Registration opens on Monday, October 15, 2023.
